name: Atlantis Atrium Paradise Suite
description: The Atrium Paradise Suite occupies the pinnacle of the Atlantis tower experience. Located among the VIP suite floors at the top of the resort, this suite features an open atrium layout, premium appointments throughout, and Penthouse Villa-level access. Atlantis reserves the 26th and 27th floor VIP suites for guests booking through exclusive channels — GTHS can arrange access for group organizers seeking the highest level of accommodation at the resort. Includes all Concierge Tower privileges plus elevated butler-style service.
shortDescription: Top-tier VIP suite at the pinnacle of Atlantis — atrium layout, Penthouse Villa access, and butler service.

faqs.question: How do I book the Atrium Paradise Suite?
faqs.answer: VIP suites on the 26th and 27th floors at Atlantis are not available through standard booking channels. Contact GTHS directly — we can arrange group suite access for qualifying group sizes.

testimonials.quote: Atlantis is a favorite hotel destination for travelers near and far. The resort genuinely offers everything you're looking for — and then some.
testimonials.author: Atlantis Casino Resort Spa

meta.title: Atlantis Atrium Paradise Suite – VIP Penthouse Reno | Golf The High Sierra
meta.description: The Atlantis Atrium Paradise Suite — top VIP floors of Atlantis Casino Resort Spa, Reno. GTHS can arrange exclusive access for golf group organizers.
